text: Here guys, look.
I've still got... I've been drinking Pepsi Max.
I've got a bottle here just to remind me of what I went through before I had this YouTube success.
Before I was getting money from AdSense.

This is what I used to live off of
and every time I look at it I get a little emotional
because it makes me think of the poverty and the desperation I was living in, so...
Let's just get a nice, like, uh, poetic shot of the Pepsi Max rolling out of my life.
Maybe we can voice over this and cut it out and just show the pepsi rolling.

and we can make it black and white
and symbolic-
[bottle thumps]
- in slow motion
so it's like the Pepsi Max is rolling out of my life.
And I've moved on and, uh...
now I'm drinking Diet Coke.
Which means that I've achieved a better life for myself,
for my wife,
for my audience,
and this edgy - this edgy ending.
So, go ahead and enjoy this very poetic shot.
[bottle thumps]
And, um, thanks for staying with me, guys.
[thumps]
[thumps slow down and echo]
